scenario_text.value: Hey look, that’s Ryo and Saki over there.

They went ahead, but I guess they took the
long way around?
More importantly, who’s that girl, I wonder?

Okay! You listening? These rockslides are
retribution from the Kemonogami.

“Retribution”?
In this day and age?
Give me a break...

Yes! When disrespectful outsiders cause
trouble on the mountain, they get mad!

This holy mountain is the Kemonorium,
a sacred shrine to the Kemonogami!

This is no place for someone to just wander
around!
The heck’s a “Kemonorium”?

I bet it’s some weird rock or bear carving.
They worship that stuff in the boonies.

Chill out, Ryo. She’s just a kid. You don’t
have to get so nasty with her.
Nasty?! I was just—!
Hmph! The boonies, you say. How rude!
This is the site of a glorious shrine!

Not some new imitation, but a historic,
legendary shrine known only to locals!

A shrine? You mean like the ones supposed to
have ancient gods?

I’ve read about those before. Gods of the
harvest, or fertility, things like that.

Nah, this is different. These are ancient
Beast Gods known only to the locals!

I’d never seen anything like these gods until
I came here. They’re really something else.
Sounds like a fairy tale to me.
It isn’t! They’re real!
What’s your name, kid?
It’s Miu! What’s your name?
I’m Saki, and this guy with the ’tude is Ryo.

So Miu, do you think you could take us to
this hidden shrine you’re talking about?
Take you? Umm... I guess so...

Curious, huh? You don’t really believe in
this stuff, do you?
I’m telling you it’s real!

Why not? Our field trip’s been canceled,
so it’s not like we don’t have the time...

All we have waiting for us back at camp is
some busywork, right? You hate that stuff.

Are you seriously telling me you’re not even
a tiny bit interested in all this?
...I still say this is stupid.
It is NOT stupid!
Yeah, yeah, whatever you say, kid.
It’s not “kid”! It’s Miu!

Well lead the way, Miu. I’m not gonna be
happy if you’re messin’ with us, got it?
For real? They just went off with that kid!

There’s no way that’s going to be credited
in place of our landmark... Oh, that Saki...

Something tells me they’re not up to anything
so commendable.

We don’t even know what kind of shrine it is!
They can’t just go on their own.
We don’t know?

Hmm, at the very least, I don’t see anything
like it on the map.

Could there really be a hidden shrine?
Or is it just some kid’s imagination?
What do you think, Takuma?
(Hmm, how should I respond?)
Sounds fun!
We have to stop them!
Let them have fun.
Follow Saki and Ryo.

Sounds like a good time.
Let’s follow them!

Yeah, now that’s what I’m talking about!
Heyyy, you guys!
Oh great, just what we needed...

The shrine of the Kemonogami? Sounds fun!
Can we go with you?
Sure, the more the merrier!
Thanks! Nice to meet you!
You too!

Sounds like we had a couple of
eavesdroppers...

Why don’t you and your merry band of bozos
go back to your school trip?!
Let’s get a move-on, Miu!
Come on, don’t be like that!

...Jeez, Ryo. That attitude of yours needs
some work!
Sorry about that, you guys.
Ryo, you and Miu wait up!
There they go again.
Keep away from danger.
Yeah, I figured you’d say that, Takuma.
Now hold on, all of you!
Hmm? What is it, Aoi?

It’s dangerous past this point, right? We
shouldn’t go without adult permission.
Oh come ooon, don’t be such a stickler, Aoi!
Yeah, what a stickler!
Yeah! You’re like a walking rule book.
A walking rule book...

Goody-two-shoes girls aren’t popular with the
guys, you know.

But she’s got two boys with her! She must be
super popular!
Heh, you got me there.
You’ve completely lost me!

Is the sun getting to you, Aoi?
You’re red as a beet.

They’d cordon the place off if it was that
bad. Think of this as independent research!
The Kemonogami shrine isn’t dangerous!

We can’t get through there after the
landslide. You sure about this?

Sure I’m sure! There’s another trail to the
shrine, one out of the landslide’s path.
Yeah, but...

So let’s keep going. Unless you have
something to say, Ryo?
Shut it...

And there he goes.
Guess he didn’t feel like listening.

Leave it alone, man. You too, Aoi, no need to
look so down in the dumps.
Down in the dumps? Hardly...
Wait here and see.

And where do you think you’re going, Ryo?
Hey, I said hold on!
Pipe down and back off!
Now, now, don’t be like that...

Hey, are you sure it’s safe to go to this
shrine of yours?

You betcha! The Kemonogami shrine isn’t
dangerous at all!
Where do you think you’re going, Minoru?!

You plan on going with them? You know we
can’t just go off on our own.

Huh?
...Well yeah, that’s true.
Aaand there goes Ryo, off again.

For now, we’d better wait here for someone
to tell us where to go next.
That, or head back to the school...
Gotta admit, that sounds like a pain.

More importantly, we have no idea what might
happen. We should chase after those three!
Yeah, let’s follow them!
